August 20, 2020 NCR Hospitality Channel Partner Enablement Call Don’t miss the new NCR Hospitality Channel Partner Enablement calls to hear what’s new with our solutions from the NCR team. Register now for the next meeting on Friday, September 4, 2020 @ 1:30 - 2:30PM ET <[[https://ncr.webex.com/ncr/onstage/g.php?MTID=eddbff919aff8e6f3fba95c48eb8ba9d6]]>. The event password is “HOSP2020.”
It’s Time for Technical Training
Check out the NCR training calendar <[[https://email.ncr.com/dx00D16AmF0Ym00QaP020B0]]> for the technical training courses offered in September with all the course details, dates/times, and registration information. Technicians can register now <[[https://ncr.csod.com/client/ncr/default2.aspx]]> via NCRU to attend any available session and receive credit for your participation. Customers Need Training Too! Don’t forget to keep customers trained on the latest information and solution updates. Make sure your team is leveraging the plethora of NCR Hospitality customer-facing training resources to help support our customers' success. Click on the links in each section below to access these materials.
